features.name: Authentication and User Management

features.name: Audit Logging and Route Monitoring
features.description: Automatic CRUD logging via decorators, route coverage auditing, and user action history retrieval APIs.

features.name: GRV Results Management
features.description: Blueprint managing portfolios, indicators, processes, and dashboards for company results with Playwright exports.

features.name: Meetings Module
features.description: Scheduling and managing meetings, agendas, and reports with template-driven exports.

features.name: My Work Task Management
features.description: Personal productivity module for tracking activities, workloads, and calendar entries tied to plans.

features.name: Infrastructure and Configuration
features.description: Environment configuration, database abstraction layer, Celery integration, and deployment scripts.

features.name: AI and Integration Services
features.description: AI helper services and integration scripts that extend automation capabilities and background tasks.
